title: WATCH: VAR controversy for Juventus' second goal against Torino in Coppa Italia
description: Juventus edged rivals Torino 2-0 in the Coppa Italia quarter-finals, but only after a controversial decision was made using the video assistant referee.
content: Mario Mandzukic scored Juve's second in the 67th minute, though Sami Khedira appeared to foul Afriyie Acquah in the build-up to the goal.Torino's players encouraged the referee to consult the VAR, but after taking his time to study the footage, he allowed the goal to stand.Head coach Sinisa Mihajlovic was furious with the decision, and was sent to the stands as a result.Should the goal have stood? Watch the video above to see the VAR controversy
